channel.title: CUGC Archives ⋆ Citrix User Group Finland
channel.description: CUG.fi on voittoa tavoittelematon, yksityisten henkilöiden toimesta vuonna 2003 perustettu vapaaehtoisvoimin toimiva, rekisteröity yhdistys. Sen tavoitteena on tukea Citrix-ammattilaisten ja käyttäjien verkostoitumista, edistää tiedonvälitystä ja tarjota best practises-kokemuksia jäsenilleen järjestämällä erilaisia teemaseminaareja ja tapaamisia. Yhdistys on ensisijaisesti tarkoitettu henkilöille jotka työkseen kehittävät ja ylläpitävät Citrix- ympäristöjä.

item.title: CUGC -tapahtumia
item.dc:creator: Petri Liekovuo
item.description:
Register For Free Today! Stay ahead of the curve with our Connect and User Share webinars. Hear from fellow members and industry experts, see the latest demos, ask [...]

The post CUGC -tapahtumia appeared first on Citrix User Group Finland.
item.content:encoded:
Register For Free Today!

Stay ahead of the curve with our Connect and User Share webinars. Hear from fellow members and industry experts, see the latest demos, ask questions and join the independent discussion.

 

 

Connect: Unified Endpoint Management in a Citrix Virtual World

Wednesday, March 22, 2017

1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EDT

Presenters: Douglas Brown, Global Technology Evangelist, IGEL & Simon Clephan, VP Business Development and Strategic Alliances, IGEL

Member Moderator: Eduardo Molina, CTP and Cincinnati CUGC Leader

What: Learn about the importance of a unified endpoint management strategy for any Citrix XenApp/XenDesktop deployment. Presentation will include live attendee Q&A and details about IGEL’s Tesla giveaway.

Full Details and Registration

 

 

User Share: Best Practices for Citrix with App-V

Thursday, March 23, 2017

1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EDT

Presenter: Tim Mangan, CTP and Boston CUGC Leader

Member Moderator: Tobias Kreidl, CTP and CUGC Steering Committee

What: Everything you need to know about deploying App-V in a Citrix environment in the various XenApp & XenDeskop versions. Presentation will include live attendee Q&A.

Full Details and Registration

 

 

User Share: State & Local Govt. SIG–Washington State DOT NetScaler Discussion and Case Study

Wednesday, March 29, 2017

2:00 PM – 3:30 PM EDT

Presenter: Aaron Hutchinson, Washington State DOT and State & Local Govt. SIG Leader

Member Discussion Panelists: John Flanagan, Wake County, NC Government and State & Local Govt. SIG Leader, with Andy Whiteside, Charlotte CUGC

What: Find out how the Washington State Department of Transportation used Citrix NetScaler to replace their older load balancing equipment and ease the burden on their expansive web server infrastructure. Discussion-style presentation will include live attendee Q&A.

Full Details and Registration

 

 

Connect: Citrix XenServer Runs on Enterprise Cloud

Thursday, April 6, 2017

1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EDT

Presenter: Stephen Duckaert, Product Manager, Nutanix

Member Moderator: Mike Nelson, CTP

What: Find out about new features for XenServer 7 on Nutanix, including graphics support, tighter Windows integration and increased security. Presentation will include a customer case study, as well as Q&A from attendees.

Participants also have the chance to win a $100 Amazon gift card from Nutanix by opting-in at registration.

Full Details and Registration

 

 

User Share: Windows 10 on XenDesktop Part 2–Universal Apps Platform & File Type Associations

Wednesday, April 19, 2017

1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EDT

Presenter: James Rankin, CTA

Member Moderator: Andrew Wood, CTP and UK CUGC Steering Committee Member

What: Following up on the first discussion about the major changes that IT organizations notice with Windows 10 (editions, servicing branches and migration considerations), James will move on to the Microsoft’s Universal Windows Apps platform and then the problem of File Type Associations. Presentation will include live attendee Q&A.

Full Details and Registration

 

 

Save the Date! More User Shares Coming Soon:

 

Healthcare & Networking SIGs: NetScaler Solutions for Novant Healthcare – Wednesday, May 3 at 2:00PM EDT

Lab it Up! With Citrix Unidesk Part 2: PVS – Thursday, May 4, Time TBA

Miss a Recent Webinar?

You’re in luck! Recordings of our Connect and User Share webinars are always available under the Files tab at myCUGC.org. Check out our most recent recordings:

CUGC User Share: Lab it Up! With Citrix Unidesk (03/02/17)
(And don’t miss the extensive Q&A from this webinar in the CUGC Events forum!)

CUGC Connect: Liquidware Labs ProfileDisk and Profile Portability (03/01/17)

CUGC Connect: Introducing Citrix Unidesk–Citrix App Layering Discussion and Demo (02/23/17)

Don’t Forget to Cast Your Vote!

The response to our first-ever t-shirt design was fantastic! Now, it’s up to YOU to choose the winning design from our three finalists. Voting closes on March 30, 2017. Vote Now!
